content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5, y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5, y=-32.0), and offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) that puts into furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
-  Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5) that connects the furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0) to other entities

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using connect_entities function
-  Ensure that the positions passed to the function are of type Position, not float.
-  Make sure to access the position attribute of an entity correctly, i.e., entity.position, not entity.position.position.

### Errors when placing entities
-  No errors of this type found in the given logs.

### NAMESPACE
-  No utility functions defined by the agent found in the given logs.
-  Important variables assigned:
  - offshore_pump: entity of type OffshorePump
  - boiler: entity of type Boiler
  - steam_engine: entity of type SteamEngine
  - burner_mining_drill: entity of type BurnerMiningDrill
  - furnace: entity of type Furnace
  - burner_inserter: entity of type BurnerInserter
  - transport_belt: entity of type TransportBelt
  - small_electric_pole: entity of type SmallElectricPole
  - pipe: entity of type Pipe
  - pipe_group: entity of type PipeGroup
  - electricity_group: entity of type ElectricityGroup
  - belt_group: entity of type BeltGroup
